name: The Treasure of Temple Espaguetis
description:
The Treasure of Temple Espaguetis is an exploratory adventure game in which the player takes control of an aspiring treasure hunter on their journey to find the fabled treasure of Temple Espaguetis.  Run, Jump, and Climb your way through this mysterious temple and find the ancient treasure stored away within this mysterious temple!

Controls-
WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement

Spacebar - Jump (press multiple times against a wall to walljump)

Credits-

Player Character sprites, Treasure Sprite, and Level Design by Nathaniel Hebert (AKA Cherry_Soup)

Base Code by Michael Baker

Kronbits' Inca Game Assets

Kauzz's Forest and Cave 16x16 tilesets
